components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Console WhatsApp Edit Senders Page Error

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in users unable to edit WhatsApp senders within the Console. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing users unable to edit WhatsApp senders within the Console. has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are investigating an error with users unable to edit WhatsApp senders within the Console. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

incidents.name: Issue with KYC Onboarding in TrustHub Console

incident_updates.body: We are currently seeing degraded performance on our TrustHub portal in Console. Customers are unable to create Compliance Profiles, Branded Calling registrations, or Regulatory Compliance Bundles, and will see an error in Console. Customers going through the Account Upgrade flow will also see an error. Additionally our ISV customers using Embeds will also see errors. Our engineering team is looking into the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an error with users unable to complete the Account Upgrade flow. Additionally, users are not able to create/edit Compliance Profiles and Registrations. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to MyTel Network in Myanmar

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending to MyTel Network in Myanmar. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Vodafone Network in Ireland

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Vodafone network in Ireland. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in elevated 500s error for Conversations API. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing elevated 500s error for Conversations API has been identified. We are actively working with our engineers to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing elevated 500s error for Conversations API. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS and MMS Delivery Delays To and From a Subset of Twilio Phone Numbers in Australia

incident_updates.body:
We continue to observe latency in SMS and MMS delivery reports sent from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia to network subscribers, specially during the peak traffic between 14:00 and 20:00 PST. However, the actual SMS and MMS are being delivered on time.

For the SMS and MMS from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia, we are observing delivery delays.

We have identified that the primary cause of this latency is an ongoing undersea cable fault. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have confirmed that this incident is impacting SMS and MMS Delivery Report delays when sending messages to and from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia rather than SMS and MMS message delivery when sending messages to and from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia, and we can confirm that SMS and MMS delivery is operating normally; delayed delivery reports may be more noticeable during peak traffic in Australia between 14:0020:00 PST. Our investigation indicates the primary contributor is an ongoing undersea cable fault causing increased latency, and our engineers are working closely with our carrier partner to mitigate the impact and restore normal delivery report timing. We will provide another update within 24 hours, or sooner if more information becomes available.

Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 February 2026 at 13:00 PST until 04 February 2026 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio France phone numbers.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 February 2026 at 20:00 PST until 05 February 2026 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 February 2026 at 22:00 PST until 05 February 2026 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to AT&T Mexico handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner T-Mobile Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 February 2026 at 23:00 PST until 05 February 2026 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for T-Mobile Germany customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in the Philippines is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 February 2026 at 11:00 PST until 06 February 2026 at 12:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays to Twilio Philippines phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 06 February 2026 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting Team is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, February 7th, 2026, at01:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Flex Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable.

Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2 The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 25 February 2026 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 02 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
04 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 04 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
09 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 09 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
11 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 11 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
16 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 16 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
18 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 18 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
25 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 25 February 2026 at 16:00 PST

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
